Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

AIL_3D_sample_status

The function AIL_3D_sample_status returns the playback status of the specified sample handle.

U32 AIL_3D_sample_status(
  H3DSAMPLE S
);

In Parameters

S
indicates the sample handle to query.

Returns

One of the MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS constants.


Group: 3D Digital Audio Services
Related Functions: AIL_end_3D_sample, AIL_resume_3D_sample, AIL_start_3D_sample, AIL_stop_3D_sample
Related Basic Types: H3DSAMPLE, MILES_DIGITAL_STATUS, U32
